column4: So how can I configure mpd and orangeplayer (or any other such web-based mpd client) to work together?
Googling isn't resulting in much help
what did you search for?
even just "orangeplayer mpd" doesn't return anything
try without the quotes and add 'ubuntu'
just a bunch of random asian sites
change your language
it's english
http://tinyurl.com/6d5y4p
right, none of those are relevant
that's exactly what i searched for
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/mpd/+bug/192735  ?
...I'm trying to figure out how to configure mpd + orangeplayer
not file a bug report
you know, i've never used them, so I don't know.. I'm just trying to help troubleshoot it... that bug report says it won't work because of pulseaudio... so I didn't know if you'd checked that or not
It's not an issue of "not working", it's an issue of "not yet configured". I appreciate the help, but I think this needs more help from somebody who's actually set it up
plus, I'm in gutsy, precisely for that reason :P
yeah, i can't seem to find orangeplayer in hardy at all :P
it's a PHP script/client
it's not in repos
it's for use with mpd
